summary: This bill, the "No Retaining Every Gun In a System That Restricts Your Rights Act," aims to restrict the federal government's access to firearm transaction records. It mandates the destruction of existing records held by the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives (ATF) related to discontinued firearm businesses. It also aims to prevent the future collection of such records and requires the ATF to report the number of records destroyed to Congress.
